Build powerful relationships with the Edda Portal

Designed for connection, transparency, and trust. Edda Portal allows you to build enduring and successful LP - GP relationships.

Broadcast your performances

  • Create a centralized space to provide updates to your LPs
  • Share statistics and key figures from Dealflow
  • Grant LPs access to other Edda modules to keep everyone informed

Share documents

  • A single source of truth for your LPs.
  • Easily share your latest LP reports
  • Control document access with customisable audiences
